oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Mapp v. Board of Education correspondence, 1961 December 26
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Motley, Constance Baker, 1921-2005; Williams, Avon N.; Witt, Raymond B., 1915-2000
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Letter from the attorneys for the plaintiffs and defendants in Mapp v. Board of Education outlining the areas of disagreement between the parties concerning desegregation of public schools in Chattanooga, Tennessee.
